content.question: The image is best understood in the context of which of the following twentieth-century developments?

choices.label: New modes of transportation and communication that increased contact between regions
The growth of multinational corporations promoting free markets
The creation of newly independent states following the end of the Second World War
Competition between the superpowers for political influence in developing nations

content.answer: New modes of transportation and communication that increased contact between regions

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
